'''Rhonda''' is a woman who works at the museum, where [[Ross Geller]] used to worked. She is very loud. When she was little in grade school, she used to be friends with one of Ross' colleague, Peter, and often shared her Pudding Pockets with him.

When the colleagues share embarrassing facts about themselves in the museum cafeteria, she admits that her large breasts are not real.
